title: Ten Years Are Not That Far - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Love Rivals   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Short Story   Wealthy Characters
author: Jiu Lu Fei Xiang   九鹭非香
description: On that fated day, Qu Xi watched the suave, young and talented Gu Yan present on the lecture theater in her high school. From then on, she grabbed on and never let go, while he tried his hardest to force her away. In the end, when both of them have been reduced to their lowest points, will he truly repent? And will she accept him again?>
